entities.name: ginny
entities.description: Ginny is the one who is trying to calm down the girl and get her inside. She says 'It's all right' and 'I know'.

entities.name: girl
entities.description: The girl is the one who is scared and wants to go home. She whispers that she doesn't want to fight anymore.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is present in the scene, but he's not directly involved in the conversation between Ginny and the girl. He has a reaction of feeling cold ripples on his skin.

relationships.description: Ginny is comforting the girl, trying to calm her down and reassure her that everything will be okay.
